title: Kia Carnival & EV launch: CEO Gwanggu Lee gives a glimpse of the road ahead
description: Kia India plans to launch its first mass-market electric vehicle next year and target 4 lakh annual sales by 2030. Currently, it offers two high-end electric models. The company aims to consolidate its position in the SUV segment and expects festive sales to revitalize the market after a slowdown in recent months.
